 2007-04792007-04-02,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisAppointment of SHERRY H. STEWART of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
